trans-unit.source: Encapsulates HTTP-response information from an ASP.NET operation.
trans-unit.target: 封装来自 ASP.NET 操作的 HTTP 响应信息。

trans-unit.source: The methods and properties of the HttpResponse class are exposed through the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.Response%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl> classes.
trans-unit.target: 通过公开的方法和属性的 HttpResponse 类<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.Response%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>， <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>， <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.Response%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following methods of the HttpResponse class are supported only in post back scenarios and not in asynchronous post back scenarios: - <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.BinaryWrite%2A> - <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Clear%2A> - <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ClearContent%2A> - <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ClearHeaders%2A> - <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Close%2A> - <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A> - <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Flush%2A> - <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.TransmitFile%2A> - <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Write%2A> - <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.WriteFile%2A> - <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.WriteSubstitution%2A> Partial-page updates are enabled when you use <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> controls to update selected regions of a page instead of updating the whole page with a post back.
trans-unit.target: HttpResponse 类的以下方法仅在回发的情况下支持和不在异步 post 备份方案:- <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.BinaryWrite%2A>- <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Clear%2A>- <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ClearContent%2A>- <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ClearHeaders%2A>- <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Close%2A>- <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A>- <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Flush%2A>- <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.TransmitFile%2A>- <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Write%2A>- <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.WriteFile%2A>-<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.WriteSubstitution%2A>使用时启用局部页面更新<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控件以更新而不是使用一种回发更新整个页面的页面的选定的区域。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> </xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.WriteSubstitution%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.WriteFile%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Write%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.TransmitFile%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Flush%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Close%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ClearHeaders%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ClearContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.BinaryWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[UpdatePanel 控件概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[局部页面呈现概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Associates a set of cache dependencies with the response to facilitate invalidation of the response if it is stored in the output cache and the specified dependencies change.

trans-unit.target: AddCacheDependency 方法允许的依赖项来创建两个缓存的响应和<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency>对象。</xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency>

trans-unit.target: 文件、 缓存键或<xref href="System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency"></xref>将添加到应用程序依赖关系的列表。

trans-unit.source: The dependencies parameter is .

trans-unit.source: When the items referred to in the `cacheKeys` parameter are removed from the cache, the cached response of the current item is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 当引用的项在`cacheKeys`从缓存中删除参数，当前项的缓存的响应无效。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"> </xref> ，包含当前缓存的响应所依赖的项的键。

trans-unit.source: Makes the validity of a cached item dependent on another item in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 使缓存项的有效性依赖于另一个项中缓存。

trans-unit.source: When any of the `cacheKey`s are removed from the cache, the cached response of the current item is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一`cacheKey`从缓存中删除 s，当前项的缓存的响应无效。

trans-unit.source: An array of item keys that the cached response is dependent upon.
trans-unit.target: 缓存的响应所依赖的项键的数组。

trans-unit.source: Makes the validity of a cached response dependent on another item in the cache.

trans-unit.source: The key of the item that the cached response is dependent upon.
trans-unit.target: 缓存的响应所依赖的项键。

trans-unit.source: When you use the AddFileDependency method to add a file dependency, you must also specify output caching programmatically or declaratively.

trans-unit.source: For example, to specify output caching declaratively, use the directive.

trans-unit.source: Adds an HTTP header to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 将 HTTP 标头添加到输出流。

trans-unit.source: AddHeader is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP.

trans-unit.source: AddHeader is the same as <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AppendHeader%2A> and is provided only for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP.
trans-unit.target: AddHeader 等同于<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AppendHeader%2A>，仅为与 ASP 的早期版本的兼容性提供。</xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AppendHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: With ASP.NET, use <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AppendHeader%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 带 ASP.NET、 使用<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AppendHeader%2A>.</xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AppendHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the HTTP header to add `value` to.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的 HTTP 标头的名称`value`到。

trans-unit.source: The string to add to the header.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到标头的字符串。

trans-unit.source: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.2 and later versions] Registers a callback that the ASP.NET runtime will invoke immediately before response headers are sent for this request.
trans-unit.target: [在.NET Framework 4.5.2 及更高版本中受支持] 注册的响应此请求发送标头之前，ASP.NET 运行时将调用的回调。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The AddOnSendingHeaders method is not invoked if the native module flushes the response first.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT]1> 不调用 AddOnSendingHeaders 方法，如果本机模块第一次刷新响应。

trans-unit.source: The pseudo-event OnSendingHeaders differs from the IHttpModule-level pipeline event in that it is a per-request subscription rather than a per-application subscription.
trans-unit.target: 伪事件 OnSendingHeaders 区别于 IHttpModule 级管道事件，因为它是每个请求订阅，而不是每个应用程序订阅。

trans-unit.source: The intent is that the callback may modify the response status code or may set a response cookie or header.
trans-unit.target: 其目的是回调可能会修改响应状态代码，或可能响应 cookie 或标头设置。

trans-unit.source: Other usage notes and caveats: - This method is effective only when IIS runs in integrated pipeline mode pipeline and only if response headers haven't yet been sent for the current request.
trans-unit.target: 其他使用情况注意事项和警告:-仅当在集成的管道模式管线中运行 IIS 和仅当尚未尚未为当前请求发送响应标头，此方法才有效。

trans-unit.source: - The ASP.NET runtime does not guarantee anything about the thread that the callback is invoked on.
trans-unit.target: -ASP.NET 运行时不保证有关调用回调的线程的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, the callback may be invoked synchronously in a background thread if a background flush is being performed.
trans-unit.target: 例如，调用该回调可能会以同步方式在后台线程中如果正在执行后台刷新。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A> is not guaranteed to be available in such a thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A>不保证在此类线程中不可用。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The callback must not call any method that manipulates the response entity body or that results in a flush.
trans-unit.target: -回调必须调用操作的响应实体正文或这将导致在刷新任何方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, the callback must not call <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A>, as that method may manipulate the response entity body.
trans-unit.target: 例如，回调必须调用<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A>，如该方法可能操作的响应实体正文。</xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The callback must contain only short-running synchronous code.
trans-unit.target: -回调必须包含仅短时间运行的同步代码。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to invoke an asynchronous operation or wait on such an operation could result in a deadlock.
trans-unit.target: 尝试调用异步操作或等待此类操作可能导致死锁。

trans-unit.source: - The callback must not throw an exception; otherwise behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: -回调必须不会引发异常;否则行为是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: The callback method.
trans-unit.target: 回调方法。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.ISubscriptionToken"></xref> object that represents the subscription to the OnSendingHeaders pseudo-event.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.ISubscriptionToken"> </xref>对象，表示对 OnSendingHeaders 伪事件的订阅。

trans-unit.source: Adds an HTTP cookie to the intrinsic cookie collection.
trans-unit.target: 将 HTTP cookie 添加到内部 cookie 集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpCookie"></xref> to add to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.HttpCookie"> </xref>要添加到输出流。

trans-unit.source: A cookie is appended after the HTTP headers have been sent.
trans-unit.target: 已发送的 HTTP 标头后追加一个 cookie。

trans-unit.source: Adds an HTTP header to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 将 HTTP 标头添加到输出流。

trans-unit.source: If you use the AppendHeader method to send cache-specific headers and at the same time use the cache object model (<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cache%2A>) to set cache policy, HTTP response headers that pertain to caching (`Cache-Control`, `Expires`, `Last-Modified`, `Pragma`, and `Vary`) might be deleted when the cache object model is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用 AppendHeader 方法发送缓存特定的标头和在同一时间使用的缓存对象模型 (<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cache%2A>) 若要设置缓存策略，适用于缓存的 HTTP 响应标头 (`Cache-Control`， `Expires`， `Last-Modified`， `Pragma`，和`Vary`) 使用的缓存对象模型时可能会删除。</xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cache%2A>

trans-unit.source: This behavior enables ASP.NET to maintain the most restrictive settings.
trans-unit.target: 此行为使 ASP.NET 能够维护的限制性最强的设置。

trans-unit.source: For example, consider a page that includes user controls.
trans-unit.target: 例如，考虑包括用户控件的页面。

trans-unit.source: If those controls have conflicting cache policies, the most restrictive cache policy will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果这些控件具有冲突的缓存策略，则将使用限制性最强的缓存策略。

trans-unit.source: If one user control sets the header "`Cache-Control: Public`" and another user control sets the more restrictive header "`Cache-Control: Private`" via calls to <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability%2A>, then the "`Cache-Control: Private`" header will be sent with the response.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个用户控件设置的标头"`Cache-Control: Public`"和另一个用户控件设置的限制性更强的标头"`Cache-Control: Private`"通过调用<xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability%2A>，则"`Cache-Control: Private`"标头将与响应一起发送。</xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of standard HTTP/1.1 headers, see section 14, "Header Field Definitions," in the [Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=73147) specification on the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关标准 HTTP/1.1 标头的列表，请参阅部分 14 中，"标头字段定义，"[超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=73147) World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 网站上的规范。

trans-unit.source: The name of the HTTP header to add to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到输出流的 HTTP 标头的名称。

trans-unit.source: The string to append to the header.
trans-unit.target: 要追加到标头的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The header is appended after the HTTP headers have been sent.
trans-unit.target: 已发送的 HTTP 标头后追加标头。

trans-unit.source: Adds custom log information to the Internet Information Services (IIS) log file.
trans-unit.target: 将自定义日志信息添加到 Internet Information Services (IIS) 日志文件。

trans-unit.source: To allow for the specified string to be recorded in the log file, you first must enable the **URI Query** option of the **Extended Logging Properties** dialog box for the site that you want to log activity for in IIS.
trans-unit.target: 若要允许要记录在日志文件中的指定字符串，必须先启用**URI 查询**选项**扩展日志记录属性**对话框中，你想要在 IIS 中记录的活动的站点。

trans-unit.source: To customize extended logging in IIS 6.0, follow these steps: 1.
trans-unit.target: 要自定义扩展中的日志记录 IIS 6.0，请按照下列步骤︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: In IIS Manager, expand the local computer node, expand the Web or FTP Sites folder, right-click the Web or FTP site, and then click **Properties**.
trans-unit.target: 在 IIS 管理器中，展开本地计算机节点，展开 Web 或 FTP 站点文件夹，右键单击 Web 或 FTP 站点，然后单击**属性**。

trans-unit.source: Click the **Web or FTP Site** tab, and then select the **Enable logging** check box (if it is not already selected).
trans-unit.target: 单击**Web 或 FTP 站点**选项卡上，然后选择**启用日志记录**复选框 （如果尚未选择）。

trans-unit.source: In the **Active log format** box, click **W3C Extended Log File Format**.
trans-unit.target: 在**活动日志格式**框中，单击**W3C 扩展日志文件格式**。

trans-unit.source: Click **Properties**.
trans-unit.target: 单击“属性” 。

trans-unit.source: Click the **Advanced** tab, select the properties that you want to log, and then click **OK**.
trans-unit.target: 单击**高级**选项卡上，选择你想要登录，然后单击属性**确定**。

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the log file.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到日志文件的文本。

trans-unit.source: Adds a session ID to the virtual path if the session is using <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection.Cookieless*> session state and returns the combined path. If <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection.Cookieless*> session state is not used, ApplyAppPathModifier returns the original virtual path.
trans-unit.target: 将会话 ID 添加到虚拟路径，如果会话正在使用<> *1> 会话状态并返回组合的路径。如果<> *1> 不使用会话状态，ApplyAppPathModifier 返回原始虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: ApplyAppPathModifier is used only with cookieless sessions to construct absolute HREFs.
trans-unit.target: 只能与无 cookie 会话使用 ApplyAppPathModifier 构造绝对 Href。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path to a resource.
trans-unit.target: 资源的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: The virtualPath with the session ID inserted.
trans-unit.target: virtualPath ID 插入会话。

trans-unit.source: Sends the currently buffered response to the client.
trans-unit.target: 将发送到客户端当前所有缓冲的响应。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying <xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest> object supports asynchronous flush operations and this method is called from an asynchronous module event or from an asynchronous handler, the flush operation is performed asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 如果基础<xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest>对象支持异步刷新操作，从异步模块事件或从异步处理程序调用此方法以异步方式执行刷新操作。</xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the flush operation is performed synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 否则，会以同步方式执行刷新操作。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous flush is supported for IIS 6.0 and later.
trans-unit.target: IIS 6.0 及更高版本支持异步刷新。

trans-unit.source: The callback object.

trans-unit.target: 异步结果对象中。

trans-unit.source: The response is already completed.
trans-unit.target: 响应已完成。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果缓冲了发送到客户端的输出;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the caching policy (such as expiration time, privacy settings, and vary clauses) of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 获取的缓存策略 (如过期时间、 隐私设置和 vary 子句) 的网页。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.HttpCachePolicy"></xref> object that contains information about the caching policy of the current response.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.HttpCachePolicy"> </xref>包含当前响应的缓存策略相关信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Cache-Control" name="Cache-Control" href=""></xref> HTTP header that matches one of the <xref href="System.Web.HttpCacheability"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref uid="langword_csharp_Cache-Control" name="Cache-Control" href=""></xref>之一相匹配的 HTTP 标头<xref href="System.Web.HttpCacheability"></xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The values for `Private`, `Public`, and `No-Cache` are strings and must be enclosed in quotation marks (" ").
trans-unit.target: 值`Private`， `Public`，和`No-Cache`是字符串，并且必须用引号引起来 ("")。

trans-unit.source: If the CacheControl property is set to a value that does not match one of the <xref:System.Web.HttpCacheability> enumeration values, then an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果 CacheControl 属性设置为一个值，与任一都不匹配<xref:System.Web.HttpCacheability>枚举值，则<xref:System.ArgumentException>引发。</xref:System.ArgumentException> </xref:System.Web.HttpCacheability>

trans-unit.source: If the CacheControl property is not set, the cacheability of the response is set to <xref:System.Web.HttpCacheability>.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置 CacheControl 属性的响应可缓存性设置为<xref:System.Web.HttpCacheability>。</xref:System.Web.HttpCacheability>

trans-unit.source: The `CacheControl`, <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Expires%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ExpiresAbsolute%2A> properties have been deprecated.
trans-unit.target: `CacheControl`， <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Expires%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ExpiresAbsolute%2A>属性已被否决。</xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ExpiresAbsolute%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Expires%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the methods of the <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy> class are available through the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cache%2A> intrinsic object to control the Internet Information Services (IIS) output cache and client caches.
trans-unit.target: 相反的方法<xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy>类均可通过<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cache%2A>内部函数的对象以控制 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 输出缓存和客户端缓存。</xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cache%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy>

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the <xref href="System.Web.HttpCacheability"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 字符串表示形式<xref href="System.Web.HttpCacheability"></xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The string value set does not match one of the <xref href="System.Web.HttpCacheability"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 设置的字符串值不匹配之一<xref href="System.Web.HttpCacheability"></xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the HTTP character set of the output stream.

trans-unit.target: `Charset`属性可以设置为`null`以禁止 HTTP`Content-Type`标头。

trans-unit.source: Clears all content output from the buffer stream.

trans-unit.source: The Clear method does not clear header information.
trans-unit.target: Clear 方法并不会清除标头信息。

trans-unit.source: Clears all content output from the buffer stream.
trans-unit.target: 清除缓冲区流中的所有内容输出。

trans-unit.source: The ClearContent method does not clear header information.
trans-unit.target: ClearContent 方法并不会清除标头信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken> object that is tripped when the client disconnects.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken>客户端断开连接时触发的对象。</xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken>

trans-unit.source: This API is thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 是线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: However, there are some restrictions on how the cancellation token should be used.
trans-unit.target: 但是，有一些限制有关应如何使用取消标记。

trans-unit.source: Using it incorrectly can lead to race conditions, deadlocks, or other unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: 使用不当可能导致争用条件、 死锁或其他意外的行为。

trans-unit.source: Keep in mind the following guidelines: - Ensure that you don't call into this API outside the bounds of a single request, because ASP.NET will dispose of the cancellation token at the end of the request.
trans-unit.target: 请记住以下准则:-确保你不调用此 api 超出边界的单个请求，因为 ASP.NET 将处置末尾的请求的取消标记。

trans-unit.source: There is no guarantee that the token will ever transition to a canceled state before it is disposed.
trans-unit.target: 就释放之前，令牌曾经将转换为已取消状态不能保证。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the request finishes without the client having disconnected, the token will be disposed without having first been canceled.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果没有具有断开连接使用客户端完成请求，该令牌将释放而无需首先具有已取消。

trans-unit.source: - Do not wait on the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.WaitHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, as this defeats the purpose of an asynchronous notification and can cause deadlocks.
trans-unit.target: -不等待的<xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.WaitHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，如这与异步通知的初衷背道而驰并且会导致死锁。</xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.WaitHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - Do not call the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.Register%2A?displayProperty=fullName> overloads which invoke the callback on the original <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext> object.
trans-unit.target: -不要调用<xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.Register%2A?displayProperty=fullName>原始调用回调的重载<xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext>对象。</xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext> </xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.Register%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - Do not use the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> object or other non-thread-safe ASP.NET intrinsic objects from within the callback provided to the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.Register%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: -不要使用<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>对象或其他非线程安全 ASP.NET 内部对象从在回调提供给<xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.Register%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.Register%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The callback may be running concurrently with other ASP.NET or application code.
trans-unit.target: 回调可能会与其他 ASP.NET 并发运行或应用程序代码。

trans-unit.source: - Keep the callback methods short-running and non-blocking.
trans-unit.target: -保持短时间运行并且非阻塞的回调方法。

trans-unit.source: - Make every effort to avoid throwing exceptions from within the callback methods.
trans-unit.target: -请尽量避免引发从回调方法中的异常。

trans-unit.source: This property is only applicable to Internet Information Service (IIS) 7.5 in integrated mode.
trans-unit.target: 在集成模式下此属性才适用到 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 7.5。

trans-unit.source: If you invoke it without the right IIS version or pipeline mode, a <xref:System.PlatformNotSupportedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果你调用它而无需右 IIS 版本或管道模式下，<xref:System.PlatformNotSupportedException>引发。</xref:System.PlatformNotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: To determine the IIS version, use <xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.IISVersion%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定 IIS 版本，请使用<xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.IISVersion%2A>。</xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.IISVersion%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the pipeline mode, use <xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.UsingIntegratedPipeline%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定管道模式，请使用<xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.UsingIntegratedPipeline%2A>。</xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.UsingIntegratedPipeline%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cancellation token.
trans-unit.target: 取消标记。

trans-unit.source: Closes the socket connection to a client.
trans-unit.target: 关闭到客户端的套接字连接。

trans-unit.source: This method terminates the connection to the client in an abrupt manner and is not intended for normal HTTP request processing.
trans-unit.target: 此方法以突然的方式终止客户端连接，并不用于正常处理 HTTP 请求。

trans-unit.source: The method sends a reset packet to the client, which can cause response data that is buffered on the server, the client, or somewhere in between to be dropped.
trans-unit.target: 该方法将重置数据包发送到客户端，可能会导致在服务器、 客户端，或在某处之间会删除已缓冲的响应数据。

trans-unit.source: However, typically you should call <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A> instead if you want to jump ahead to the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> event and send a response to the client.
trans-unit.target: 但是，通常你应调用<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A>而是如果你想要跳转到<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest>事件，将发送到客户端的响应。</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the HTTP character set of the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置输出流的 HTTP 字符集。

trans-unit.source: Default `ContentEncoding` can be specified in an ASP.NET configuration file in the [globalization Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e2dffc8e-ebd2-439b-a2fd-e3ac5e620da7) section.
trans-unit.target: 默认`ContentEncoding`可以在 ASP.NET 配置文件中指定[全球化元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e2dffc8e-ebd2-439b-a2fd-e3ac5e620da7)部分。

trans-unit.source: If ContentEncoding is specified by the client, the default configuration settings are overridden.
trans-unit.target: 如果由客户端指定 ContentEncoding，则将重写默认配置设置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Text.Encoding> object that contains information about the character set of the current response.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Text.Encoding>对象，其中包含当前响应的字符集相关信息。</xref:System.Text.Encoding>

trans-unit.source: Attempted to set ContentEncoding to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 尝试设置为 ContentEncoding <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the HTTP MIME type of the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置输出流的 HTTP MIME 类型。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP MIME type of the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 输出流的 HTTP MIME 类型。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "<xref uid="langword_csharp_text/html" name="text/html" href=""></xref>".
trans-unit.target: 默认值是"<xref uid="langword_csharp_text/html" name="text/html" href=""></xref>"。

trans-unit.source: The ContentType property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: ContentType 属性设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the response cookie collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取响应 cookie 集合。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET includes two intrinsic cookie collections.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 包括两个内部 cookie 集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection accessed through the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies%2A> collection of <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> contains cookies transmitted by the client to the server in the `Cookie` header.
trans-unit.target: 通过访问的集合<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>包含传输到中的服务器客户端的 cookie`Cookie`标头。</xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> </xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies%2A>

trans-unit.source: The collection accessed through the Cookies collection of <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse> contains new cookies created on the server and transmitted to the client in the `Set-Cookie` header.
trans-unit.target: 通过 Cookie 集合的访问的集合<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>包含新 cookie 在服务器上创建和传输到客户端在`Set-Cookie`标头。</xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>

trans-unit.source: After you add a cookie by using the Cookies collection, the cookie is immediately available in the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection, even if the response has not been sent to the client.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 Cookie 集合中添加一个 cookie 后，cookie 将立即出现在<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合，即使不向客户端发送响应。</xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The response cookie collection.
trans-unit.target: 响应 cookie 集合。

trans-unit.source: Disables kernel caching for the current response.
trans-unit.target: 禁用当前响应的内核缓存。

trans-unit.source: If kernel caching is not supported, this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果不支持的内核缓存，则此方法无效。

trans-unit.source: Disables IIS user-mode caching for this response.
trans-unit.target: 禁用 IIS 用户-方式来缓存反映。

trans-unit.source: If IIS user-mode caching is not supported, this method returns without performing any action.
trans-unit.target: 如果不支持 IIS 用户-方式来缓存，此方法将返回而不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Sends all currently buffered output to the client, stops execution of the page, and raises the <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 将当前缓冲的所有输出都发送到客户端，停止执行的页上，并引发<xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided only for compatibility with ASP—that is, for compatibility with COM-based Web-programming technology that preceded ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 提供此方法仅为了与 ASP 的兼容性-即，与前面 ASP.NET 的基于 COM 的 Web 编程技术的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: If you want to jump ahead to the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> event and send a response to the client, it is usually preferable to call <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要跳转到<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest>事件发送到客户端的响应，它是通常更可取的方法调用<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A>相反。</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest>

trans-unit.source: To mimic the behavior of the `End` method in ASP, this method tries to raise a <xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 若要模拟的行为`End`方法 ASP 中的，此方法尝试引发<xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException>异常。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException>

trans-unit.source: If this attempt is successful, the calling thread will be aborted, which is detrimental to your site's performance.
trans-unit.target: 如果此尝试成功，将中止调用线程，这是对站点的性能造成不利影响。

trans-unit.source: In that case, no code after the call to the End method is executed.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，执行结束方法在调用后的没有代码。

trans-unit.source: If the End method is not able to raise a <xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException>, it instead flushes the response bytes to the client.
trans-unit.target: 如果 End 方法不能引发<xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException>，而是将响应字节数刷新到客户端。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException>

trans-unit.source: It does this synchronously, which can also be detrimental to your site's performance.
trans-unit.target: 这是以同步方式，也可以是对站点的性能造成不利影响。

trans-unit.source: In either case (whether or not a <xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException> exception is successfully raised), the response pipeline jumps ahead to the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: 在任一情况下 (是否<xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException>成功引发异常)，响应管道向前跳到<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest>事件。</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> </xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A> method does not raise an exception, and code after the call to the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A> method might be executed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A>方法不会引发异常，并在调用之后的代码<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A>可能执行方法。</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your intention is to avoid execution of subsequent code, and if the performance penalty of End is acceptable, you can call End instead of <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的意图是为了避免执行的后续代码，并且端的性能损失就是可接受，您可以调用结束，而不是<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A>。</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A>

trans-unit.source: The call to End has terminated the current request.
trans-unit.target: 结束对的调用已终止当前请求。

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous flush operation.
trans-unit.target: 完成异步刷新操作。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous result object.
trans-unit.target: 异步结果对象中。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous flush is not supported and the asyncResult parameter is .
trans-unit.target: 不支持异步刷新和 asyncResult 参数是 。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous flush is not supported and the asyncResult parameter cannot be cast to a `FlushAsyncResult` object.
trans-unit.target: 不支持异步刷新和 asyncResult 参数不能强制转换为`FlushAsyncResult`对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of minutes before a page cached on a browser expires.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在浏览器上缓存的页面过期之前的分钟数。

trans-unit.source: If the user returns to the same page before it expires, the cached version is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户在页面过期之前返回同一页上，将显示缓存的版本。

trans-unit.source: Expires is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP.
trans-unit.target: 过期为了与 ASP 的早期版本的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: The `Expires`, <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ExpiresAbsolute%2A> and <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.CacheControl%2A> properties have been deprecated in favor of the methods of the <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy> class available through the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cache%2A> intrinsic object to control the Internet Information Services (IIS) output cache and client caches.
trans-unit.target: `Expires`，<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ExpiresAbsolute%2A>和<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.CacheControl%2A>的方法已弃用属性<xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy>类可通过<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cache%2A>内部函数的对象以控制 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 输出缓存和客户端缓存。</xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cache%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy> </xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.CacheControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ExpiresAbsolute%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of minutes before the page expires.
trans-unit.target: 该页过期之前的分钟数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the absolute date and time at which to remove cached information from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个绝对日期和时间从缓存中移删除缓存的信息。

trans-unit.source: ExpiresAbsolute is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP.
trans-unit.target: ExpiresAbsolute 提供为了与 ASP 的早期版本兼容。

trans-unit.source: The `ExpiresAbsolute`, <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Expires%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.CacheControl%2A> properties have been deprecated in favor of the methods of the <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy> class available through the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cache%2A> intrinsic object to control the Internet Information Services (IIS) output cache and client caches.
trans-unit.target: `ExpiresAbsolute`， <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Expires%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.CacheControl%2A>的方法已弃用属性<xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy>类可通过<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cache%2A>内部函数的对象以控制 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 输出缓存和客户端缓存。</xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cache%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy> </xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.CacheControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Expires%2A>

trans-unit.source: The date and time at which the page expires.
trans-unit.target: 过期日期和时间的页。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a wrapping filter object that is used to modify the HTTP entity body before transmission.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个包装筛选器对象，该对象用于修改在传输之前的 HTTP 实体正文。

trans-unit.source: When you create a `Stream` object and set the Filter property to the `Stream` object, all HTTP output sent by <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Write%2A> passes through the filter.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建`Stream`对象，并将筛选器属性设置为`Stream`对象，所有 HTTP 发送的输出<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Write%2A>通过筛选器。</xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Write%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream> object that acts as the output filter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream>用作输出筛选器的对象。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Filtering is not allowed with the entity.
trans-unit.target: 不允许与实体进行筛选。

trans-unit.source: Sends all currently buffered output to the client.
trans-unit.target: 将当前缓冲的所有输出都发送到客户端。

trans-unit.source: Forces all currently buffered output to be sent to the client.
trans-unit.target: 强制所有当前缓冲的输出发送到客户端。

trans-unit.source: The Flush method can be called multiple times during request processing.
trans-unit.target: Flush 方法可以在请求处理期间多次调用。

trans-unit.source: The cache is flushed after the response has been sent.
trans-unit.target: 已发送响应后，会刷新缓存。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously sends all currently buffered output to the client.
trans-unit.target: 向客户端异步发送当前缓冲的所有输出。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> that represents the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>表示异步操作。</xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref:System.Text.Encoding> object that represents the encoding for the current header output stream.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref:System.Text.Encoding>对象，表示当前标头的编码输出流。</xref:System.Text.Encoding>

trans-unit.source: The HeaderEncoding property gives you the ability to disable or change the <xref:System.Text.Encoding> object on a response header by using the <xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding>, <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>, <xref:System.Text.UTF7Encoding>, or <xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding> object.
trans-unit.target: HeaderEncoding 属性使您能够禁用或更改<xref:System.Text.Encoding>上使用的响应标头对象<xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding>， <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>， <xref:System.Text.UTF7Encoding>，或<xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding>对象。</xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding> </xref:System.Text.UTF7Encoding> </xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> </xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding> </xref:System.Text.Encoding>

trans-unit.source: The default encoding value is the <xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding> class.
trans-unit.target: 默认编码值是<xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding>类。</xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding>

trans-unit.source: By changing the type of the HeaderEncoding property, you can potentially increase the risk of certain malicious attacks or cause sensitive data to be sent through the response header.
trans-unit.target: 通过更改 HeaderEncoding 属性的类型，你可能会提高某些恶意攻击的风险或导致通过响应标头发送敏感数据。

trans-unit.source: Header injection attacks can be avoided, in part, by leaving the HeaderEncoding property of a response to the default setting.
trans-unit.target: 可以避免标头注入式攻击，情况情况下，通过将对默认设置的响应该 HeaderEncoding 属性。

trans-unit.source: An attack against a vulnerable application could echo back entrusted data as part of a response header.
trans-unit.target: 易受攻击的应用程序的攻击无法回显导致将受信任数据作为响应标头的一部分。

trans-unit.source: If the HeaderEncoding is disabled because of a requirement for continuation lines in a header or if any header is constructed based on the result of untrusted data, the header data should be validated before sending to the response stream.
trans-unit.target: 如果由于必需的标头中的连续行而禁用 HeaderEncoding 或任何标头构造基于的不受信任的数据的结果，应在发送到响应流之前验证标头数据。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Text.Encoding> that contains information about the character set for the current header.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.Encoding>包含当前标头的字符集相关信息。</xref:System.Text.Encoding>

trans-unit.source: The encoding value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 编码的值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of response headers.
trans-unit.target: 获取响应标头的集合。

trans-unit.source: The Headers property is only supported with the [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] integrated pipeline mode and at least the .NET Framework 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 标头属性只支持使用[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]集成的管道模式并且至少.NET Framework 3.0。

trans-unit.source: When you try to access the Headers property and either of these two conditions is not met, a <xref:System.PlatformNotSupportedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 当你尝试访问的标头属性和这两个条件之一不满足，<xref:System.PlatformNotSupportedException>引发。</xref:System.PlatformNotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref> of response headers.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"> </xref>响应标头。

trans-unit.source: The operation requires the integrated pipeline mode in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and at least the .NET Framework version 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 该操作要求中的集成的管道模式[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]并且至少.NET Framework 版本 3.0。

trans-unit.source: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.2 and later versions] Gets a value indicating whether the response headers have been written.
trans-unit.target: [在.NET Framework 4.5.2 及更高版本中受支持] 获取一个值，该值指示是否已写入响应标头。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the response headers have been written; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已编写响应标头;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the client is still connected to the server.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，指示客户端是否仍连接到服务器。

trans-unit.source: The IsClientConnected property returns `false` when the following conditions are true: - The connection to the client was terminated.
trans-unit.target: IsClientConnected 属性返回`false`当以下条件都为真:-与客户端的连接已终止。

trans-unit.source: This can occur if the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Close%2A> method was invoked, or if the client stopped execution of the Web page or browsed to another page.
trans-unit.target: 发生这种情况<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Close%2A>调用方法，或者如果客户端停止 Web 页的执行，或浏览到另一页。</xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest> object that is handling the request is `null` or the <xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest.IsClientConnected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest>正在处理请求的对象是`null`或<xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest.IsClientConnected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法返回`false`。</xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest.IsClientConnected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest>

trans-unit.source: If a custom <xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest> object handles the request, then the <xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest.IsClientConnected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method might be set based on custom criteria.
trans-unit.target: 如果自定义<xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest>对象处理该请求，则<xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest.IsClientConnected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法可能基于设置自定义的条件。</xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest.IsClientConnected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest>

trans-unit.source: For example, the custom worker request might force a time-out after a period of time.
trans-unit.target: 例如，自定义的辅助请求可能会在一段时间后强制超时。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the client is currently connected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果客户端当前连接;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the client is being transferred to a new location.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个布尔值，该值指示客户端传输到新位置。

trans-unit.source: Use the IsRequestBeingRedirected property with the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.RedirectLocation%2A> property to test and determine whether the absolute URI that is transmitted to the client in the HTTP `Location` header is different than the current URI and what the new intended URI that is being transferred to will be.
trans-unit.target: 使用具有的 IsRequestBeingRedirected 属性<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.RedirectLocation%2A>属性测试，并确定是否的绝对 URI 都传输到客户端在 HTTP`Location`标头是与当前 URI 和是否正在被传输到新的目标的 URI 将不同。</xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.RedirectLocation%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value of the location response header is different than the current location; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果位置响应标头的值不同于当前的位置;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Enables output of text to the outgoing HTTP response stream.
trans-unit.target: 实现到传出 HTTP 响应流的文本的输出。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> object that enables custom output to the client.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.IO.TextWriter>实现到客户端的自定义输出的对象。</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: Enables binary output to the outgoing HTTP content body.
trans-unit.target: 实现到传出 HTTP 内容主体的二进制输出。

trans-unit.source: An IO <xref:System.IO.Stream> representing the raw contents of the outgoing HTTP content body.
trans-unit.target: IO<xref:System.IO.Stream>表示传出 HTTP 内容主体的原始内容。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: OutputStream is not available.
trans-unit.target: OutputStream不可用。

trans-unit.source: Appends a HTTP <xref uid="langword_csharp_PICS-Label" name="PICS-Label" href=""></xref> header to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 将追加 HTTP <xref uid="langword_csharp_PICS-Label" name="PICS-Label" href=""> </xref>写入输出流的标头。

trans-unit.source: Platform for Internet Content Selection (PICS) is a World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) standard for content labeling.
trans-unit.target: 平台 Internet 内容所选内容 （图片） 是万维网联合会 (W3C) 标准，用于内容标签。

trans-unit.source: PICS is essentially a language for creating a ratings system.
trans-unit.target: 图片是实质上是用于创建的分级系统的语言。

trans-unit.source: Any value can be a PICS label; ASP.NET does not validate the label.
trans-unit.target: 任何该值可以为图片标签;ASP.NET 不会验证标签。

trans-unit.source: The maximum length of the string is 255 characters.
trans-unit.target: 字符串的最大长度为 255 个字符。

trans-unit.source: For more information about PICS standards and syntax, see the [World Wide Web Consortium](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37125) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关图片标准和语法的详细信息，请参阅[World Wide Web Consortium](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37125) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: The string to add to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_PICS-Label" name="PICS-Label" href=""></xref> header.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到的字符串<xref uid="langword_csharp_PICS-Label" name="PICS-Label" href=""></xref>标头。

trans-unit.source: This API is to support applications sending push promises to HTTP 2.0 clients.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 是支持将推送承诺发送到 HTTP 2.0 客户端的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: You can find more details regarding to Http2 server push at [HTTP/2 Specification Section 8.2: Server Push](http://http2.github.io/http2-spec/#PushResources).
trans-unit.target: 你可以找到更多详细信息有关 Http2 服务器推送到[HTTP/2 规范第 8.2 节︰ 服务器推送](http://http2.github.io/http2-spec/#PushResources)。

trans-unit.source: PushPromise is non-deterministic and applications shouldn't have logic that depends on it.
trans-unit.target: PushPromise 是不确定的而且应用程序不应具有依赖于它的逻辑。

trans-unit.source: Its only purpose is performance advantage in some cases.
trans-unit.target: 其唯一的目的是在某些情况下的性能优势。

trans-unit.source: There are many conditions (protocol and implementation) that may cause to ignore the push requests completely.
trans-unit.target: 有可能会导致完全忽略推送请求的多个条件 （协议和实现）。

trans-unit.source: The expectation is based on fire-and-forget.
trans-unit.target: 假定条件下基于即发即弃。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the push request.
trans-unit.target: 推送请求的 URL。

trans-unit.source: It should be the virtual path of the relative resource that the server wants to push to the client.
trans-unit.target: 它应为服务器想要将推送到客户端的相对资源的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: This API is to support applications sending push promises to HTTP 2.0 clients.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 是支持将推送承诺发送到 HTTP 2.0 客户端的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: You can find more details regarding to Http2 server push at [HTTP/2 Specification Section 8.2: Server Push](http://http2.github.io/http2-spec/#PushResources).
trans-unit.target: 你可以找到更多详细信息有关 Http2 服务器推送到[HTTP/2 规范第 8.2 节︰ 服务器推送](http://http2.github.io/http2-spec/#PushResources)。

trans-unit.source: PushPromise is non-deterministic and applications shouldn't have logic that depends on it.
trans-unit.target: PushPromise 是不确定的而且应用程序不应具有依赖于它的逻辑。

trans-unit.source: Its only purpose is performance advantage in some cases.
trans-unit.target: 其唯一的目的是在某些情况下的性能优势。

trans-unit.source: There are many conditions (protocol and implementation) that may cause to ignore the push requests completely.
trans-unit.target: 有可能会导致完全忽略推送请求的多个条件 （协议和实现）。

trans-unit.source: The expectation is based on fire-and-forget.
trans-unit.target: 假定条件下基于即发即弃。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the push request.
trans-unit.target: 推送请求的 URL。

trans-unit.source: It should be the virtual path of the relative resource that the server wants to push to the client.
trans-unit.target: 它应为服务器想要将推送到客户端的相对资源的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: Http request method that would be used by the push request.
trans-unit.target: 将由推送请求使用的 http 请求方法。

trans-unit.source: Http request header that would be used by the push request.
trans-unit.target: 将由推送请求使用的 http 请求头。

trans-unit.source: Redirects a request to a new URL and specifies the new URL.
trans-unit.target: 将请求重定向到新 URL 并指定新的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Calling Redirect is equivalent to calling <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A> with the second parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 调用重定向等效于调用<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A>第二个参数设置为`true`。</xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A>

trans-unit.source: Redirect calls <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A> which throws a <xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException> exception upon completion.
trans-unit.target: 将调用重定向<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A>该类会引发<xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException>完成后的异常。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException> </xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A>

trans-unit.source: This exception has a detrimental effect on Web application performance.
trans-unit.target: 此异常有不利的影响对 Web 应用程序性能。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, we recommend that instead of this overload you use the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> overload and pass `false` for the `endResponse` parameter, and then call the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 因此，我们建议，而不是此重载使用<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>重载，并传递`false`为`endResponse`参数，，然后调用<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For mobile pages only, if your application relies on cookieless sessions, or might receive requests from mobile devices that require cookieless sessions, using a tilde (~) in a path can result in creating a new session and potentially losing session data.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 移动的页面，如果你的应用程序依赖于无 cookie 会话，或可能会收到来自移动设备的需要无 cookie 会话的请求路径中使用波形符 （~） 会导致创建新的会话和可能会丢失会话数据。

trans-unit.source: To set a property on a mobile control with a path such as "~/path", resolve the path using <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.ResolveUrl%2A> "~/path" before assigning it to the property.
trans-unit.target: 具有路径移动控件上设置属性，如"~ / 路径"，解决路径使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.ResolveUrl%2A>"~ / 路径"之前将其分配给属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.ResolveUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET performs the redirection by returning a 302 HTTP status code.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 执行通过返回 HTTP 状态代码为 302 重定向。

trans-unit.source: An alternative way to transfer control to another page is the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 一种替代方式，将控制转移到另一页是<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method is typically more efficient because it does not cause a round trip to the client.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法是通常更高效，因为它不会往返过程导致向客户端。</xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Redirect Users to Another Page](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 将用户重定向到另一页](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The target location.
trans-unit.target: 目标位置。

trans-unit.source: A redirection is attempted after the HTTP headers have been sent.
trans-unit.target: 已发送的 HTTP 标头后尝试重定向。

trans-unit.source: Redirects a client to a new URL.
trans-unit.target: 客户端重定向到新 URL。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the new URL and whether execution of the current page should terminate.
trans-unit.target: 指定新的 URL 以及是否应终止当前页的执行。

trans-unit.source: An absolute URL (for example, http://www.contoso.com/default.aspx) or a relative URL (for example, Default.aspx) can be specified for the target location but some browsers may reject a relative URL.
trans-unit.target: 可以为目标位置指定绝对 URL (例如，http://www.contoso.com/default.aspx) 或相对 URL (例如，Default.aspx)，但是某些浏览器可能拒绝相对 URL。

trans-unit.source: When you use this method in a page handler to terminate a request for one page and start a new request for another page, set `endResponse` to `false` and then call the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用此方法在页处理程序中一页并开始新请求的另一页，设置终止请求`endResponse`到`false`，然后调用<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you specify `true` for the `endResponse` parameter, this method calls the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A> method for the original request, which throws a <xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException> exception when it completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定`true`为`endResponse`参数，此方法调用<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A>原始请求，将引发方法<xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException>完成时的异常。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException> </xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A>

trans-unit.source: This exception has a detrimental effect on Web application performance, which is why passing `false` for the `endResponse` parameter is recommended.
trans-unit.target: 此异常有不利的影响对 Web 应用程序性能，这正是传递`false`为`endResponse`建议参数。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For mobile pages, if your application relies on cookieless sessions, or might receive requests from mobile devices that require cookieless sessions, using a tilde (~) in a path can create a new session and potentially lose session data.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 移动页面，如果你的应用程序依赖于无 cookie 会话，或可能会收到来自移动设备的需要无 cookie 会话的请求路径中使用波形符 （~） 可以创建新的会话并可能会丢失会话数据。

trans-unit.source: To set a property on a mobile control with a path such as "~/path", resolve the path using <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.ResolveUrl%2A> "~/path" before assigning it to the property.
trans-unit.target: 具有路径移动控件上设置属性，如"~ / 路径"，解决路径使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.ResolveUrl%2A>"~ / 路径"之前将其分配给属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.ResolveUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET performs the redirection by returning a 302 HTTP status code.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 执行通过返回 HTTP 状态代码为 302 重定向。

trans-unit.source: An alternative way to transfer control to another page is the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 一种替代方式，将控制转移到另一页是<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method is typically more efficient because it does not cause a round trip to the client.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法是通常更高效，因为它不会往返过程导致向客户端。</xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Redirect Users to Another Page](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 将用户重定向到另一页](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The location of the target.
trans-unit.target: 目标位置。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether execution of the current page should terminate.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否应终止当前页的执行。

trans-unit.source: url is .
trans-unit.target: urlis .

trans-unit.source: url contains a newline character.
trans-unit.target: url包含换行符。

trans-unit.source: A redirection is attempted after the HTTP headers have been sent.
trans-unit.target: 已发送的 HTTP 标头后尝试重定向。

trans-unit.source: The SubStatusCode property is only supported with the integrated pipeline mode in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and at least the .NET Framework version 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 中的集成的管道模式仅支持 SubStatusCode 属性[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]并且至少.NET Framework 版本 3.0。

trans-unit.source: When you set the SubStatusCode property, the status is logged on [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] if failed-request tracing is configured.
trans-unit.target: 当设置 SubStatusCode 属性时，状态登录[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]如果配置失败请求跟踪。

trans-unit.source: Independent of whether tracing is configured, the code is never sent as part of the final response to the request.
trans-unit.target: 独立于跟踪的配置是否，代码永远不会发送到请求的最终响应的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Troubleshooting Failed Requests Using Failed Request Tracing in IIS 7.0](http://www.iis.net/default.aspx?tabid=2&subtabid=25&i=969&p=1).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[故障排除失败的请求使用失败请求跟踪在 IIS 7.0 中](http://www.iis.net/default.aspx?tabid=2&subtabid=25&i=969&p=1)。

trans-unit.source: An integer value that represents the [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] sub status code.

trans-unit.source: The operation requires the integrated pipeline mode in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and at least the .NET Framework version 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 该操作要求中的集成的管道模式[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]并且至少.NET Framework 版本 3.0。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the connection supports asynchronous flush operations; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将 HTTP 内容发送到客户端。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要取消输出，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.2 and later versions] Gets or sets a value indicating whether to suppress the default `Cache Control: private` header for the current HTTP response.
trans-unit.target: [在.NET Framework 4.5.2 及更高版本中受支持] 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否取消默认`Cache Control: private`当前 HTTP 响应标头。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET sends a `Cache-Control: private` response header unless an explicit cache policy has been specified for this response.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 将发送`Cache-Control: private`响应标头除非已为此响应指定一个显式的缓存策略。

trans-unit.source: This property allows suppressing this default response header on a per-request basis.
trans-unit.target: 此属性允许取消基于每个请求此默认响应标头。

trans-unit.source: The header can still be suppressed for the entire application by setting <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.SendCacheControlHeader%2A> in [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369) or [outputCache Element for caching (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/47cd2b47-316f-4dfd-bbf8-539be3066fee).
trans-unit.target: 标头仍整个应用程序通过设置抑制<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.SendCacheControlHeader%2A>中[httpRuntime 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)或[outputCache 元素的缓存 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/47cd2b47-316f-4dfd-bbf8-539be3066fee)。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.SendCacheControlHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use caution when suppressing the default `Cache-Control: private` header, as proxies and other intermediaries may treat responses without this header as cacheable by default.
trans-unit.target: 禁止显示默认值时要格外小心`Cache-Control: private`标头，为代理和其他中间方可能将没有此标头的响应视为可缓存默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: This treatment can lead to the inadvertent caching of sensitive information.
trans-unit.target: 此处理可能导致意外的缓存的敏感信息。

trans-unit.source: See [RFC 2616, Sec. 13.4](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[RFC 2616、 sec。 13.4](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616)有关详细信息。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to suppress the default `Cache Control: private` header for the current HTTP response; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要取消默认`Cache Control: private`标头为当前 HTTP 响应中; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether forms authentication redirection to the login page should be suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定是否应取消窗体身份认证重定向到登录页。

trans-unit.source: By default, forms authentication converts HTTP 401 status codes to 302 in order to redirect to the login page.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，窗体身份验证都将重定向到登录页以便将 HTTP 401 状态代码转换为 302。

trans-unit.source: This isn't appropriate for certain classes of errors, such as when authentication succeeds but authorization fails, or when the current request is an AJAX or web service request.
trans-unit.target: 这不适合某些类别的错误，例如当身份验证成功但授权失败，或者在当前请求的 AJAX 或 web 服务请求。

trans-unit.source: This property provides a way to suppress the redirect behavior and send the original status code to the client.
trans-unit.target: 此属性提供一种方法来取消重定向行为，并向客户端发送的原始状态代码。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if forms authentication redirection should be suppressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应取消窗体身份认证重定向;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The TrySkipIisCustomErrors property is used only when your application is hosted in IIS 7.0.
trans-unit.target: 仅当你的应用程序承载在 IIS 7.0 中时，才使用 TrySkipIisCustomErrors 属性。

trans-unit.source: When running in Classic mode in IIS 7.0 the TrySkipIisCustomErrors property default value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当以经典模式，在 IIS 7.0 中运行 TrySkipIisCustomErrors 属性默认值是`true`。

trans-unit.source: When running in Integrated mode, the TrySkipIisCustomErrors property default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在集成模式下运行时，TrySkipIisCustomErrors 属性默认值是`false`。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要禁用 IIS 自定义错误;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Writes a string to an HTTP response output stream.
trans-unit.target: 将字符串写入 HTTP 响应输出流。

trans-unit.source: Dynamically generated HTML pages can introduce security risks if input received from Web clients is not validated either when it is received from a client or when it is transmitted back to a client.
trans-unit.target: 如果从 Web 客户端接收的输入未通过验证从客户端接收或传输到客户端时，动态生成的 HTML 页面可以带来安全风险。

trans-unit.source: Malicious script that is embedded in input submitted to a Web site and later written back out to a client can appear to be originating from a trusted source.
trans-unit.target: 输入提交给 Web 站点并随后写回给客户端中嵌入的恶意脚本可能看上去来自受信任的源。

trans-unit.source: This security risk is referred to as a cross-site scripting attack.
trans-unit.target: 此安全风险称为跨站点脚本攻击。

trans-unit.source: You should always validate data that is received from a client when it will be transmitted from your site to client browsers.
trans-unit.target: 始终应验证时它会将传输从您的网站到客户端浏览器从客户端收到的数据。

trans-unit.source: Moreover, whenever you write out as HTML any data that was received as input, you should encode it using a technique such as <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.HtmlEncode%2A> or <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlEncode%2A> to prevent malicious script from executing.
trans-unit.target: 此外，每当任何已作为输入接收的数据以 HTML 的形式写出时，你应对其进行编码使用一种技术，如<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.HtmlEncode%2A>或<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlEncode%2A>阻止执行恶意脚本。</xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlEncode%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.HtmlEncode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This technique is useful for data that was not validated when it was received.
trans-unit.target: 此方法十分适用于未进行验证时它收到的数据。

trans-unit.source: When you encode or filter data, you must specify a character set for your Web pages so that your filter can identify and remove any byte sequences that do not belong to that set (such as nonalphanumeric sequences) and could potentially have malicious script embedded in them.
trans-unit.target: 当你进行编码或筛选数据时，必须指定为您的 Web 页设置，以便你的筛选器可以标识并删除任何的字节序列不属于的设置 （如非字母数字序列），并且可能无法包含嵌入的恶意脚本的字符。

trans-unit.source: For more information about cross-site scripting attacks, see article Q252985, "How to Prevent Cross-Site Scripting Security Issues" on the [Microsoft Knowledge Base](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37115) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关跨站点脚本攻击的详细信息，请参阅文章 Q252985，"如何为防止跨站点脚本安全问题"上[Microsoft 知识库文章](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37115)Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: Writes the specified file directly to an HTTP response output stream.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的文件直接写入 HTTP 响应输出流。

trans-unit.source: When this method is used with large files, calling the method might throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是使用较大的文件，则调用该方法可能引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The size of the file that can be used with this method depends on the hardware configuration of the Web server.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此方法使用的文件的大小取决于 Web 服务器的硬件配置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see article 812406, "PRB: Response.WriteFile Cannot Download a Large File" on the [Microsoft Knowledge Base](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=149903) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，参见位于，"PRB:: Response.WriteFile 无法下载大文件"上[Microsoft 知识库文章](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=149903)Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file to write to the HTTP output stream.
trans-unit.target: 该文件以写入 HTTP 输出流。

trans-unit.source: The byte position in the file where writing will start.
trans-unit.target: 将开始进行写入的文件中的字节位置。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to write to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 要写入到输出流的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Allows insertion of response substitution blocks into the response, which allows dynamic generation of specified response regions for output cached responses.
trans-unit.target: 允许响应替换块的插入响应，从而允许动态生成的输出缓存响应的指定的响应区域。

trans-unit.source: You can use the WriteSubstitution method for post-cache substitution in your output-cached pages.
trans-unit.target: 中缓存输出的网页的缓存后替换使用 WriteSubstitution 方法。

trans-unit.source: By passing a <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> object to a callback method with a prescribed <xref:System.Web.HttpResponseSubstitutionCallback> signature, you can replace output cached content at any given location in the page cache.
trans-unit.target: 通过将传递<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>具有规定的回调方法的对象<xref:System.Web.HttpResponseSubstitutionCallback>签名，你可以将输出缓存的页面缓存中任何给定位置的内容。</xref:System.Web.HttpResponseSubstitutionCallback> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: To initiate the replacement, call the WriteSubstitution method, passing it the callback method, which must be thread safe and can be either of the following: - A static method on the container page or user control.
trans-unit.target: 若要开始替换，调用 WriteSubstitution 方法，将其传递回调方法，它必须是线程安全，并可以是下列操作之一:-容器页或用户控件的静态方法。

trans-unit.source: - A static or instance method on another arbitrary object.
trans-unit.target: -A 静态或实例对另一个任意对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: On the first request to the page, the WriteSubstitution calls the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponseSubstitutionCallback> delegate to produce the output.
trans-unit.target: 在第一个请求到页面时，调用 WriteSubstitution<xref:System.Web.HttpResponseSubstitutionCallback>委托以生成输出。</xref:System.Web.HttpResponseSubstitutionCallback>

trans-unit.source: Then, it adds a substitution buffer to the response, which retains the delegate to call on future requests.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它将替换缓冲区添加到响应，也可保留要在今后的请求调用的委托。

trans-unit.source: Finally, it degrades client-side cacheability from public to server-only, ensuring future requests to the page re-invoke the delegate by not caching on the client.
trans-unit.target: 最后，它将会降低客户端可缓存性从公开为仅服务器通过不缓存客户端上确保今后的请求到页重新调用委托。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Post-cache substitution is not supported for a cached user control where output caching is applied at the user control level.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 缓存后替换不支持其中输出缓存在用户控件级别应用的缓存的用户控件。

trans-unit.source: This is also known as fragment caching.
trans-unit.target: 这也称为片段缓存。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Caching Portions of an ASP.NET Page](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[缓存的 ASP.NET 页的部分](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The method, user control, or object to substitute.
trans-unit.target: 方法、 用户控件或要替换的对象。

trans-unit.source: The target of the callback parameter is of type .
trans-unit.target: 目标 callback 形参属于类型 。
